text: Naa ɠa é ba, ɓɔɛ ti ʋɔ, è ɠɛ ti ma: ‹Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa: Ni Izilayɛle nui ta a ɠɛna ná, ná-kɔɔɠɔ gani nɔɠɔiti ti ziimaʋɛ, gaazulogai naa ʋa, nii é toozu kotoi zu, é ʋa é GALA goo wo nui ɠaazaɠa, nà, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà ɠa nà gooɠaaʋotegi ve zea, é zoloo ná-kɔɔɠɔ gani nɔɠɔ mɔinmɔingiti tosuʋɛ ma.
